english.segment1: You are a chosen generation, you are a royal priesthood, you are a holy nation, you are his own special people. That you may proclaim the praises of him who called you out of darkness. That you may proclaim the praises of him who called you into his light (his light), his marvelous light (his marvelous light). His light (his light), his marvelous light (his marvelous light).
